set.name: CustomActionsXml
set.value: <menu><item title="Cancelled" image="brick_delete.png" command="WORKFLOW" value="Incident_ChangeStatus" attributes="id,IncidentStatusId=8,Form=Incident_Cancelled" pos="out" width="450" height="500" full="false" showoutlabel="true" /> <item title="Ready for Testing" image="brick_error.png" command="WORKFLOW" value="Incident_ChangeStatus" attributes="id,IncidentStatusId=6,Form=Incident_ReadyForTesting" pos="out" width="450" height="500" full="false" showoutlabel="true" /> <item title="Mark as Resolved" image="brick_go.png" command="WORKFLOW" value="Incident_ChangeStatus" attributes="id,IncidentStatusId=7,Form=Incident_Accepted" pos="out" width="450" height="500" full="false" showoutlabel="true" /></menu>
